Name: Abandoned/Orphaned
Description: Structure is not in operation; has no identifiable owner with legal liability.

Name: Active
Description: Structure is in operation; functioning as intended.

Name: Retired/Closed
Description: Structure was withdrawn from service but remains in place.

Name: Unknown
Description: Operating status of the structure is not known.

Name: Remediated
Description: Structure remains in place but has been modified to allow fish to pass.
